The 1st session will take stock of the implementation of COVID-19 relief measures and best practices in Member States.

Great to have introductory remarks from Jose Manuel Campa @EBA_News & Gabriel Bernardino @eiopa_europa_eu, and looking forward to discussion with stakeholders. https://t.co/ZilDyoEPmk

Looking forward to chairing a roundtable with participants from the European financial sector today, including consumer & business representatives.

The aim is to evaluate relief measures to mitigate the economic impact of the COVID-19 crisis, and discuss possible improvements💡 https://t.co/CKiAwxpIwv

Happy 10th Anniversary to @eiopa_europa_eu! The mutual/coop insurance industry values our dialogue with you and moving forward towards the optimal regulatory system for all European citizens. #EIOPAat10

Also, bringing her expertise to this panel is Michaela Koller from @InsuranceEurope ⤵️

"Closing the #ProtectionGap matters. To do that it usually means increasing #insurance penetration and quicker recovery."

#EIOPAat10 @InsEuropeMK

Mario Greco, the CEO of @zurich reminded us of a major protection gap that needs to be closed to make society more #inclusive:

50% of people in Europe don’t have a regular employment contract ✍️ how will these people receive a sufficient #pension when the time comes?

#EIOPAat10

Kicking off the panel with @moniquegoyens who congratulates EIOPA of being a game-changer when it comes to #ConsumerProtection 🥳 

The Director-General of @beuc also reminded us that if consumers are not sufficiently protected, they are tipping over to poverty.

#EIOPAat10

🔔 Don't miss our 2nd panel on ‘Closing Protection Gaps’ looking at: how the insurance and pension sector can strengthen society #resilience.

Join us 👉 https://t.co/3ggRb3vFsF

#EIOPAat10 https://t.co/gSb6dG2ygM

Coming up! Keynote speech by @Europarl_EN Chair of the Economic and Monetary Affairs Committee, Irene Tinagli.

Join now 👉 https://t.co/UB33CYlIvI 

#EIOPAat10 @itinagli @EP_Economics https://t.co/Qni0x4c0W1

#EIOPAat10 🗣️ @Lucie_Pinson_ from @ReclaimFinance addresses the role of #insurance in the light of #environmental concerns ⤵️

"Insurance should adopt a proactive approach in fighting climate change." 🌍

🗣️ Andreas Brandstetter, CEO of @uniqagroup, shares his thoughts ⤵️

"@EU_Commission will look at #SolvencyIIreview, the key question is will this review go into limiting or mobilising our investment capacity? We look forward to right solutions for our problems."

#EIOPAat10 #CMU

The panel continues with the Chairman of @BIPAR_eu Juan Ramón Plá, and here's a thought 💡

"Technology should go hand in hand with robo advice.”
 
#EIOPAat10 #Robotics

Insightful discussions ongoing at #EIOPAat10 🧐

Martin Merlin from @EU_Finance 🇪🇺 pointed out that there are numerous areas where insurance can benefit from #DataSharing, but we also need to assess the risks 💻

#DigitalSingleMarket 
#DigitalFinanceStrategy
#DigitalEU

Connect to our live stream to discover our panel on "Securing a strong and sustainable recovery: The role of insurance and pensions" 🤓

👉 https://t.co/UB33CYlIvI

Three reform priorities set out by @eiopa_europa_eu chair Gabriel Bernadino for his successor at #EIOPAat10:

1⃣ Adequate and save pensions for EU citizens 
2⃣ New approach to consumer disclosure
3⃣ More centralized insurance supervision https://t.co/QVEXvamXyC
🎈Happy Birthday 🎈 https://t.co/GAbL10c7u4

Celebrating 10 years of @eiopa_europa_eu is a great way to start the day. 10th anniversary conference and truly interesting keynote of @McGuinnessEU rollin’ online. #Congrats #EIOPAat10 It has been a great joy to be working with EIOPA in developing the European insurance sector. https://t.co/0XHGZNIhPd

EIOPA has made a key contribution to financial stability and consumer protection during its first 10 years.
Thanks Chair Bernardino for your leadership.
 
Now we need to work together for a sustainable recovery after COVID.
 
Great to contribute to #EIOPAat10 this morning. https://t.co/2aCgKsllwG

Key structural reforms needed for the next decade, according to Chairman Gabriel Bernardino: 

➡️ The urgency to deliver adequate and #sustainable pensions to EU citizens
➡️ A new approach to consumer disclosures
➡️ The need for centralised #insurance supervision

#EIOPAat10
